cause.description:
Millions of Burmese have allready escaped the madness of the Burmese junta, and the mass escape continues. Millions of refugees are now residing in Thailand, many in the regugeecamps there, others spread across the country.
The Burmese in Thailand have few legal rights and live under harsch conditions.
Suppport the Burmese refugees and give the children of Burma a possibility to change their own future!
1. Legal rights for the Burmese in Thailand!
2. Educational rights for the Burmese in Thailand!
3. Make the refugee camps along the Thai-Burma border livable.
4. Support the refugees suffering from traumas!
5. Recognize the Geneva Convention!
6. Allow migrants to set up unions!
cause.mission: Support the millions of Burmese refugees, illegal and legal, living in poverty in Thailand.
cause.name: Save the Refugees from Burma!
